amendment.description: Amendment adds a requirement to include a list of all federal agencies receiving information shared with the government in the report by the Inspector General of the Intelligence Community required under the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-454 to add a requirement to include a list of all federal agencies receiving information shared with the government in the report by the Inspector General of the Intelligence Community required under the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
